scripts.build: touch RELEASE && nexe -r wgui -r RELEASE main.js -o dist/linux/F0Talk && rm RELEASE && rm -R dist/linux/node_modules; mkdir -p dist/linux/node_modules/iohook; cp -f -R node_modules/iohook/builds dist/linux/node_modules/iohook
scripts.build-win: touch RELEASE && nexe -r wgui -r RELEASE -t win32 main.js -o dist/windows/F0Talk.exe && rm RELEASE && rm -R dist/windows/node_modules; mkdir -p dist/windows/node_modules/iohook; cp -f -R node_modules/iohook/builds dist/windows/node_modules/iohook; echo 'start F0Talk.exe -g' > 'dist/windows/F0Talk GUI.bat'
scripts.wbuild:
echo ""> RELEASE && nexe -r wgui -r RELEASE main.js -o dist\windows\F0Talk && del /f RELEASE && rmdir /s dist
ode_modules && mkdir dist\windows
ode_modules\iohook && copy /E /I node_modules\iohook uilds dist\windows
ode_modules\iohook && echo "start F0Talk.exe -g" > "dist\windows\F0Talk GUI.bat"
